title: jeremypwr

created_time: September 04, 2023, 05:43:12 PMLast edit: September 11, 2023, 05:27:29 PM by jeremypwr
content: UFC 293Multi Master Challenge   Prizes1st place: 3 mBTC Free Bet2nd place: 2 mBTC Free Bet3rd place: 1 mBTC Free BetThe Rules are similar to the original Sportsbet.io Multi Master that we all enjoyed so muchRulesa)  Predict the winner of each match (earn 1-2 points)b)  Predict how many matches will NOT go the Full Distance (will be adjusted accordingly if matches get cancelled)Odds @ https://sportsbet.io/sports/mma/ufc/ufc-293/matchesMatches(2 points each)12. Israel Adesanya vs. Sean Strickland(must get 12 correct to proceed)11. Tai Tuivasa vs. Alexander Volkov10. Manel Kape vs. Felipe dos Santos9. Justin Tafa vs. Austen Lane8. Tyson Pedro vs. Anton Turkalj(1 point each)7. Carlos Ulberg vs. Jung Da Un6. Jack Jenkins vs. Chepe Mariscal5. Jamie Mullarkey vs. John Makdessi4. Nasrat Haqparast vs. Landon Quinones3. Mike Mathetha vs. Charlie Radtke2. Shane Young vs. Gabriel Miranda1. Kevin Jousset vs. Kiefer CrosbieNOT go the Full Distance   Make sure your Prediction is in this format    Example12. Israel Adesanya 11. Tai Tuivasa 10. Manel Kape 9. Justin Tafa 8. Tyson Pedro 7. Carlos Ulberg 6. Jack Jenkins 5. Jamie Mullarkey 4. Nasrat Haqparast 3. Mike Mathetha 2. Shane Young 1. Kevin Jousset NOT go the Full Distance 6

comments.author: jeremypwr
comments.body: Sportsbet.io has been kind enough to sponsor my Prediction Contests and Promos for a while now.Sportsbet.io is a sports betting website; therefore these Prediction Contests and Promos are catered to those who actually bet on/discuss sports.If you are unsure if you qualify, just shoot me a PM.  Thank you for your cooperation.
